Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Panedjem II, High Priest of Amun with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a summarily modelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in six rows of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
